channel.title: All About Everything
channel.itunes:author: John Doe
channel.description: All About Everything is a show about everything. Each week we dive into every subject known to man and talk about everything as much as we can.
channel.itunes:subtitle: All About Everything is a show about everything
channel.itunes:summary: All About Everything is a show about everything. Each week we dive into every subject known to man and talk about everything as much as we can. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Music Store

item.title: Shake Shake Shake Your Spices
item.itunes:author: John Doe
item.description: This week we talk about salt and pepper shakers, comparing and contrasting pour rates, construction materials, and overall aesthetics.
item.itunes:subtitle: A short primer on table spices
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about salt and pepper shakers, comparing and contrasting pour rates, construction materials, and overall aesthetics. Come and join the party!

item.title: Socket Wrench Shootout
item.itunes:author: Jane Doe
item.description: This week we talk about metric vs. old english socket wrenches. Which one is better? Do you really need both?
item.itunes:subtitle: Comparing socket wrenches is fun!
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about metric vs. old english socket wrenches. Which one is better? Do you really need both? Get all of your answers here.

item.title: Red, Whine, and Blue
item.itunes:author: Various
item.description: This week we talk about surviving in a Red state if you're a Blue person. Or vice versa.
item.itunes:subtitle: Red + Blue != Purple
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about surviving in a Red state if you're a Blue person. Or vice versa. Or moving to Canada.
